property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Planeswalker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. −2: Destroy target tapped creature. [0]: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Aleksi Briclot

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Martyr's Bond or another nonland permanent you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a card type with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One life at a time. That is how the world will be saved."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Seb McKinnon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will keep watch."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason Rainville

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has indestructible. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach Shielded by Faith to that creature.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Zack Stella

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heroism is more than a single act; it is hundreds of small decisions, made every day, in pursuit of a heroic cause."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ekaterina Burmak

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even after all that befell Amonkhet, Gideon never believed that his trust in Oketra was misplaced.
